name: Price of Resurrection
storyline: Hasumi, a young girl like any other suffers from sleepwalking. It seems that she does things every now and then without meaning to. However, due to a horrific accident that befalls on her sister, Hasumi learns that she is able to kill people in her sleep. Only by mastering her powers of affecting the physical world in her dreams, may she be able to attempt to resurrect her sister...
summary: An interactive story where you can kill people in your dreams
